questions.question_text: What are two authentication mechanisms for identity provider authentication? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BE
B and E are correct
see Fig.1 Step 6
" In the absence of any existing cookie within the browser, the IdP generates a login request to the browser and authenticates the browser using whatever authentication mechanism is configured and enforced by the IdP.
Note

 
The authentication mechanism is determined by the security and authentication requirements of the customer. This could be form-based authentication using username and password, Kerberos, PKI, etc. This example assumes form-based authentication."
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/td/docs/voice_ip_comm/cucm/SAML_SSO_deployment_guide/12_5_1/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5/cucm_b_saml-sso-deployment-guide-12_5_chapter_01.html

Selected Answer: BD
The answer is B and D.
https://www.cisco.com/c/en/us/support/docs/conferencing/telepresence-management-suite-tms/112565-pqa-112565-00.html

questions.question_text: Which two authentication methods does Integrated Windows Authentication use to validate Windows credentials? (Choose two.)

An administrator is setting up the Cisco Unified IM and Presence on-premises high availability feature and wants the Server Recovery Manager to initiate failover after 90 seconds. However, failover is happening after 60 seconds. How is this issue corrected?

choices.D: Change Keep Alive (Heartbeat) Timeout to 90 seconds.
choices.C: Change critical service delay to 90 seconds.
choices.B: Change Keep Alive (Heartbeat) Interval to 90 seconds.
choices.A: Change peer Heartbeat Timeout to 90 seconds.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
From experience actually deploying this in multiple real-life phone systems, D is correct. You also want to ensure that Oauth is enabled in Cisco Unity Connection enterprise parameters.

choices.A: Add CUCM under System Settings > Authz Servers in Cisco Expressway-E.
choices.B: Add CUCM under System Settings > Authz Servers in Cisco Expressway-C.
choices.D: Add CUCM under System Settings > Authz Servers in Cisco Unity Connection.
choices.C: Add CUCM under System Settings > Authz Servers in Cisco Unity.

questions.question_text: A customer is using Cisco Unified IM and Presence with high availability and has reported that their primary node is not providing any IM and Presence services. What is causing this issue?

choices.C: The presence redundancy group node state of the primary node is "initializing".
choices.B: The presence redundancy group node state of the peer node is "normal".
choices.A: The presence redundancy group node state of the primary node is "idle".
choices.D: The presence redundancy group node state of the peer node is "running in backup mode".
